content: Welcome to the Form filling room

comment.text: This translation key is used for the title displayed on an empty form room screen. It appears as a heading in the UI and provides a welcoming message to the user when the room is not occupied or is an archive folder root.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'δωμάτιο' (domatio) is a feminine noun, while 'form filling room' implies a place. The more appropriate word would be 'χώρο' (choro), which means 'space' or 'area'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Καλώς ήρθατε στον χώρο συμπλήρωσης φορμών

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, using 'στον' instead of 'στην' (which would be required with 'δωμάτιο') would improve flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Καλώς ήρθατε στον χώρο συμπλήρωσης φορμών

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a forward slash (/) to indicate gender. While acceptable in some contexts, it's generally preferred to use separate translations for masculine and feminine forms, or a gender-neutral alternative if appropriate. This could cause rendering or display issues depending on the platform.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider separate translations: 'Bienvenido a la Sala para rellenar formularios' (masculine) and 'Bienvenida a la Sala para rellenar formularios' (feminine). Alternatively, explore gender-neutral phrasing if applicable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Բարի գալուստ Ձևաթղթերի լրացման սենյակ' is a literal translation of "Welcome to the Form filling room" but lacks the warmth and naturalness of a standard welcome phrase. It sounds overly formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural-sounding welcome phrase like 'Մաղթում ենք Ձեզ Ձևաթղթերի լրացման սենյակ' (Wishing you well in the Form filling room) or 'Добро пожаловать в комнату заполнения форм' (Welcome to the Form filling room - borrowing from Russian, which is often understood in Armenia).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Welkom in de kamer voor het invullen van Formulieren" is a literal translation that sounds unnatural in Dutch. A more natural phrasing would be "Welkom in de formulier kamer" or "Welkom in de ruimte om formulieren in te vullen".
The word 'ආයුබෝවන්' is a common greeting but may not be the most appropriate tone for a form filling room. It's a very warm, formal greeting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more neutral greeting like 'ඔන්න!' or 'ආ!' depending on the desired formality. Alternatively, 'සුභ දවස!' (Good day!) could be suitable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'ආකෘති පිරවුම් කාමරයට' translates literally to 'Form filling room', the phrasing might be a bit clunky in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing might be beneficial.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ආකෘතිය පිරවෙන කාමරයට' (to the room where forms are filled) or simply 'ආකෘති කාමරයට' (to the forms room).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The punctuation is correct, but ensuring consistency in capitalization is important. While not a major issue, it's worth checking for overall consistency within the application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure capitalization follows application style guidelines. (e.g. all caps for titles or sentence case)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Добродошли у просторију за попуњавање формулара" is a literal translation that sounds unnatural in Serbian. "Prostorija" is rarely used in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Добродошли у простор за попуњавање формулара

ai_spell_check_issues.description: A more natural and concise translation would be more appropriate. "Prostorija" carries a formal connotation that doesn't align with the welcoming tone of 'Welcome'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Добродошли у простор за попуњавање образаца

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Dobrodošli u prostoriju za Popunjavanje formulara' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Serbian. 'Popunjavanje formulara' is clunky. A more natural phrasing would be 'soba za popunjavanje obrazaca' or 'soba za unošenje podataka'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dobrodošli u sobu za popunjavanje obrazaca

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Vietnamese translation includes a space before the double quotation mark at the end of the sentence. This is not standard Vietnamese punctuation and should be removed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Chào mừng bạn đến với phòng Điền biểu mẫu
